text: The Right Reverend John Chang-yik (November 20, 1933 - August 5, 2020) was a South Korean Roman Catholic prelate. He was Bishop of Diocese of Ch’unch’on, South Korea from 1994 to 2010. In 1963, he became a priest. Chang-yik died on August 5, 2020 at the age of 86.Death of Bishop John Chang Yik ==References== ==Other websites== *Biodata at Catholic Hierarchy website Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:South Korean Roman Catholic bishops
title: John Chang-yik
